exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R H : ex_lim_seq u Unable to unify "Rbar" with "ex_lim_seq v".

In environment H5 : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_lim_seq u l -> is_lim_seq v l H : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 u, v : nat -> R H2 : Lim_seq v = 0 -> False H3 : ex_Rbar_div (Lim_seq u) (Lim_seq v) x : Rbar H4 : is_lim_seq v x x0 : Rbar H1 : is_lim_seq u x0 Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Rbar_mult ?M3356 ?M3357) P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => ?M3356 * ?M3355 n) eventually P" with "Lim_seq (fun n : nat => u n / v n) = Rbar_div (Lim_seq u) (Lim_seq v)".
